title: Million Account
content: The Million Account is a savings product by Al Rajhi Bank. Customers who deposit at least 1,000 SAR are entered into a draw for 1 million SAR every 8 weeks and 10,000 SAR weekly.

title: Dependent Account
content: Dependent Accounts allow parents to open accounts for their children aged 0–15 with limited privileges using the Al Rajhi mobile app.

title: Future Account
content: Future Account is a Shariah-compliant saving plan where a fixed monthly amount is automatically deducted from the customer’s main account. Profits depend on savings duration.

title: Awaad Account
content: Awaad is a low-risk investment account helping customers achieve medium-term financial growth under Shariah-compliant principles.
